feed.title: Dockcheck Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.6
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Compatibility fixes to timeout function (no --foreground flag if busybox). thanks to @cerealconyogurt who reported and tested.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.5...v0.4.6

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.7
entry.content:
New:

  • Create notify_gotify.sh by @cerealconyogurt in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/87

Fixes:

  • zero configuration DSM notification emails by @yoyoma2 in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/88
  • smtp-template changes: deprecate ssmtp, suggest msmtp. Background and solution(https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/issues/89) by @ShanDestromp - merged in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/90

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.6...v0.4.7

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.8
entry.content:
New:

  • Added pre-commit checks by @bocan in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/92

Fixes:

  • Rewrote prune logic to not prompt if -a|-y or -n flags are used. Autoprune with -p flag. https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/commit/7d825f36c9ebcfbcfd01d1b1499276258bf4a969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.7...v0.4.8

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.4.9
entry.content:
New:

  • Added a function to include release note URLs to the notification messages by using a lookup file urls.list.
    • See Readme.
    • Credits to @Buddinski88 for the initial suggestion and @Joop9 for the final idea.
    • Thanks to @Joop9 and @yoyoma2 who debugged and suggested better ways of doing it.
  • notify_pushover.sh template added by @sudo-kraken

Fixes:

  • Rearranged the files, made a notify_templates directory to hold all templates.
  • Changed smtp+dsm templates due to variable errors.

What's Changed

  • Create notify_pushover.sh by @sudo-kraken in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/94
  • Releasenotes addon by @mag37 in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/97

New Contributors

  • @sudo-kraken made their first contribution in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/94

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.8...v0.4.9

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.5.0
entry.content:
New:

  • Added discord template.

Fixes:

  • Rewrote notify function and syntax of all templates to handle linebreaks in a more streamlined way.
    • migrate to new template manually! See previous release and README.
    • Extra thanks to @yoyoma2 and @silverbios to assisted with testing.
  • Changed regctl verbosity to account for some odd warnings, see https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/issues/100.
  • Added more URLs to the release note lookup file urls.list by @lpukatch in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/99
  • Fixed typo in DSM+SMTP templates by @thomas-mc-work in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/102

New Contributors

  • @lpukatch made their first contribution in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/99

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.4.9...v0.5.0
